H0.text: In Roman mythology, sisters Megaera, Tisiphone and Alecto are known as the what. Vengeful Goddesses

H1.text: In Roman mythology, sisters Megaera, Tisiphone and Alecto are known as the what. Infernal Sisters

H2.text: In Roman mythology, sisters Megaera, Tisiphone and Alecto are known as the what. Avenging Deities

H3.text: In Roman mythology, sisters Megaera, Tisiphone and Alecto are known as the what. Furies (or Dirae)
